023package org.opt4j.core.config;
024
025import java.io.File;
026import java.io.IOException;
027import java.net.URI;
028import java.net.URISyntaxException;
029import java.net.URL;
030import java.util.ArrayList;
031import java.util.Collection;
032import java.util.HashSet;
033import java.util.List;
034import java.util.Set;
035
036import com.google.inject.Module;
037
038/**
039 * The {@link Starter} executes configuration files.
040 * 
041 * @author lukasiewycz.
042 * 
043 */
044public class Starter {
045
046        /**
047         * Start configuration files. Using multiple configuration files: Execute
048         * the {@link Task}s successively.
049         * 
050         * @param args
051         *            the configuration files
052         * @throws Exception
053         */
054        public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
055                Starter starter = new Starter();
056                starter.execute(args);
057        }
058
059        /**
060         * Executor method.
061         * 
062         * @param args
063         *            the configuration files
064         * @throws Exception
065         */
066        public void execute(String[] args) throws Exception {
067                addPlugins();
068
069                String taskname = args[0];
070                Class<? extends Task> taskClass = Class.forName(taskname).asSubclass(Task.class);
071                String[] filenames = new String[args.length - 1];
072                for (int i = 1; i < args.length; i++) {
073                        filenames[i - 1] = args[i];
074                }
075
076                execute(taskClass, filenames);
077        }
078
079        /**
080         * Executor method.
081         * 
082         * @param taskClass
083         *            the class of the task to use
084         * @param filenames
085         *            the configuration files
086         * @throws Exception
087         */
088        public void execute(Class<? extends Task> taskClass, String[] filenames) throws Exception {
089                ModuleLoader loader = new ModuleLoader(new ModuleRegister(new ModuleAutoFinder()));
090
091                for (String filename : filenames) {
092                        Set<Module> modules = new HashSet<>();
093                        modules.addAll(loader.load(filename));
094                        Task task = taskClass.getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();
095                        task.init(modules);
096                        task.call();
097                }
098
099        }
100
101        /**
102         * Adds {@code jar} files to the classpath. Searches in folder
103         * {@code plugins}.
104         * 
105         * @return all found and added {@code jar} files
106         */
107        public Collection<File> addPlugins() {
108
109                List<File> files = new ArrayList<>();
110
111                try {
112
113                        List<String> dirs = new ArrayList<>();
114                        dirs.add("plugins");
115                        dirs.add("../plugins");
116                        URL url = getClass().getProtectionDomain().getCodeSource().getLocation();
117                        URI uri = new URI(url.toString());
118                        File parent = new File(uri);
119                        while (parent.isFile()) {
120                                parent = parent.getParentFile();
121                        }
122
123                        for (String filename : dirs) {
124                                File plugins = new File(parent, filename);
125                                try {
126                                        if (plugins.exists()) {
127                                                for (File jar : plugins.listFiles()) {
128                                                        if (jar.getName().endsWith(".jar")) {
129                                                                ClassPath.addFile(jar);
130                                                                files.add(jar);
131                                                        }
132                                                }
133                                        }
134                                } catch (IOException e1) {
135                                        e1.printStackTrace();
136                                }
137                        }
138
139                } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
140                        e.printStackTrace();
141                }
142
143                return files;
144
145        }
146
147}
